sentences.en: Don't scatter garbage all over the place.
sentences.cn: 不要随地乱扔果皮纸屑.

sentences.en: Experiments with the porous plate exhibIt'somewhat less scatter in the results.
sentences.cn: 用多孔板所得的实验结果则显得散布程度小些.

sentences.en: I'm wondering whether to scatter your brains over the room.
sentences.cn: 我只是在疑惑是否该在房间那头敲碎您的脑袋.

sentences.en: It is a lute to scatter songs to his mistress.
sentences.cn: 它是一只琵琶,向他的情侣弹奏爱恋的心曲.

sentences.en: On the table was a pile of books and a scatter of papers.
sentences.cn: 桌子上放着一摞书和零落的几份报纸。

sentences.en: Rayleigh scatter determines the upwelling diffuse flux which can be absorbed.
sentences.cn: Rayleigh散射决定了能被吸收的向外的漫射通量.

sentences.en: Scatter the grass seed over the lawn.
Scatter the tomato over, then dress the salad.
sentences.cn: 把西红柿散放在上面，然后给色拉加调味汁。

sentences.en: She tripped on a scatter rug.
The appearance of any plane was the signal to dismount and scatter.
sentences.cn: 一经发现飞机,就得下车疏散.

sentences.en: The mirror reflects light back to the scatter plate.
sentences.cn: 镜面把光反射回散射板.

sentences.en: The sound of gunfire made the crowd scatter in all directions.
The white clouds mass and scatter.
When the tree falls, the monkeys scatter.
You pile everything up and scatter things around.

trans.tran_en: if a group of people or animals scatter, or if something scatters them, they move quickly in different directions
if a group of people or animals scatter, or if something scatters them, they move quickly in different directions
if someone scatters a lot of things, or if they scatter, they are thrown or dropped over a wide area in an irregular way
